Class WeatherStation

  • java.lang.Object
    • WeatherStation

  • public class WeatherStation
extends java.lang.Object
    A weather station measures temperature and pressure and has a list of subscribed weather observers. When there is an update on the measures, the weather station publishes the update to all currently-subscribed observers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeatherStation(double t, double p)
      Initialize a new weather station.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the list of subscribed weather observers.
      double getPressure()
      Get the latest pressure measure.
      double getTemperature()
      Get the latest temperature measure.
      void publish()
      Publish the latest readings of weather data to all subscribed observers.
      void set_measurements(double t, double p)
      Update the weather data
      void subscribe(WeatherObserver o)
      Subscribe the input weather observer o as one of the observers of the current weather station.
      void unsubscribe(WeatherObserver o)
      Unsubscribe the input weather observer o from the list of observers of the current weather station.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeatherStation

        public WeatherStation(double t,
                      double p)
        Initialize a new weather station.
        Parameters:
        t - initial temperature measure
        p - initial pressure measure

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(WeatherObserver o)
        Subscribe the input weather observer o as one of the observers of the current weather station. Add the input o to the list of subscribed observers.
        Parameters:
        o - a weather observer

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(WeatherObserver o)
        Unsubscribe the input weather observer o from the list of observers of the current weather station. Remove the input o from the list of subscribed observers. Assume that the input o is an already-subscribed observer.
        Parameters:
        o - a weather observer

      • publish

        public void publish()
        Publish the latest readings of weather data to all subscribed observers. That is, perform an update on each subscribed observer.

      • getObservers

        public WeatherObserver[] getObservers()
        Get the list of subscribed weather observers.
        Returns:
        an array of subscribed weather observers.

      • getTemperature

        public double getTemperature()
        Get the latest temperature measure.
        Returns:
        latest temperature measure

      • getPressure

        public double getPressure()
        Get the latest pressure measure.
        Returns:
        latest pressure measure

      • set_measurements

        public void set_measurements(double t,
                             double p)
        Update the weather data
        Parameters:
        t - new temperature measure
        p - new pressure measure
